summary.span: 指定一个安装程序，该程序从组件复制属性以供安装时使用。

span.span: Specifies an installer that copies properties from a component to use at install time.

span.para: 继承自，必须重写方法，通常也重写和方法。
When you inherit from , you must override the method, and typically override the and methods.

Public MustOverride Sub CopyFromComponent (component As IComponent)

summary.span: 在派生类中被重写时，从指定的组件复制安装时需要的所有属性。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, copies all the properties that are required at install time from the specified component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安装程序应考虑从实时的组件，它可以的所有信息并将其存储在安装时使用。The installer should take all the information it can from the live component, and store it for use at install time. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个类`MyInstallClass`，该类创建事件日志并将日志事件的属性复制到的组件。The following example defines a class `MyInstallClass`, which creates the event log and copies the properties of the event log component to the . 它还检查是否可以执行相同类型的安装作为。It also checks whether the can perform the same kind of installation as the . summary.span: 确定指定的安装程序是否与此安装程序安装相同的对象。

span.span: Determines if the specified installer installs the same object as this installer.

returns.span: 如果此安装程序和 参数指定的安装程序安装相同的对象，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if this installer and the installer specified by the parameter install the same object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，返回`true`仅当此安装程序和安装由指定`otherInstaller`参数安装相同的对象。Typically, returns `true` only if this installer and the installer specified by the `otherInstaller` parameter install the same object. 在这种情况下，调用或上的相同的系统状态中任一安装程序结果的方法。In such a case, calling the or method on either installer results in the same system state. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个类`MyInstallClass`，该类创建事件日志并将日志事件的属性复制到的组件对象。The following example defines a class `MyInstallClass`, which creates the event log and copies the properties of the event log component to the object. 它还检查是否对象可以处理相同类型的安装作为。It also checks whether object can handle the same kind of installation as .
